name: Sona
title: Maven of the Strings
lore: Sona is Demacia's foremost virtuoso of the stringed etwahl, speaking only through her graceful chords and vibrant arias. This genteel manner has endeared her to the highborn, though others suspect her spellbinding melodies to actually emanate magic—a Demacian taboo. Silent to outsiders but somehow understood by close companions, Sona plucks her harmonies not only to soothe injured allies, but also to strike down unsuspecting enemies.
blurb: Sona is Demacia's foremost virtuoso of the stringed etwahl, speaking only through her graceful chords and vibrant arias. This genteel manner has endeared her to the highborn, though others suspect her spellbinding melodies to actually emanate magic—a...
allytips: Make sure to tag your allies while Sona's auras are active, but avoid getting caught out by enemies.
Save Crescendo for the game-altering moment.
Well-timed uses of Aria of Perseverance will grant you maximum survivability.
enemytips: Spread out when you see Sona so she can't make your entire team dance.
Kill Sona first, as she will heal up her team if left alone for too long.

riot_spell_q.name: Hymn of Valor
riot_spell_q.description: Sona plays the Hymn of Valor, sends out bolts of sound, dealing magic damage to two nearby enemies, prioritizing champions and monsters. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone bonus damage on their next attack against enemies.
riot_spell_q.tooltip:
Active: Deals {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to the nearest two enemies (prioritizes champions) and changes her Power Chord bonus to Staccato.

Melody: Sona gains an aura for {{ e3 }} seconds. Allied champions that enter the aura will gain an additional {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage on their next attack.

riot_spell_w.name: Aria of Perseverance
riot_spell_w.description: Sona plays the Aria of Perseverance, sending out protective melodies, healing Sona and a nearby wounded ally. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone a temporary shield.
riot_spell_w.tooltip:
Active: Restores {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) health to Sona and a nearby allied champion (prioritizes most wounded) and changes her Power Chord bonus to Diminuendo.

Melody: Sona gains an aura for {{ e3 }} seconds. Allied champions that enter the aura will gain a shield that prevents up to {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) damage within the next {{ e5 }} seconds.

riot_spell_e.name: Song of Celerity
riot_spell_e.description: Sona plays the Song of Celerity, granting nearby allies bonus Movement Speed. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allied champions tagged by the zone bonus Movement Speed on their next attack.
riot_spell_e.tooltip:
Active: Grants Sona {{ f1*100 }}% movement speed [{{ e1 }}% + {{ f2*100 }}% per 100 ability power] for {{ e9 }} seconds (or until damaged) and changes her Power Chord bonus to Tempo.

Melody: Sona gains an aura for {{ e3 }} seconds. Allied champions that enter the aura will gain {{ f3*100 }}% movement speed for {{ e5 }} seconds.

Sona's personal movement speed increase will always last at least {{ e5 }} seconds.

riot_spell_r.name: Crescendo
riot_spell_r.description: Sona plays her ultimate chord, stunning enemy champions and forcing them to dance and dealing magic damage to them. Each rank reduces the base cooldown of Sona's basic abilities.
riot_spell_r.tooltip:
Active: Strikes an irresistible chord, stunning enemy Champions and forcing them to dance for {{ e2 }} seconds and take {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.

Passive: Reduces the base cooldown of Sona's basic abilities by {{ e3 }}%.

riot_spell_i.name: Power Chord
riot_spell_i.description: After casting 3 spells, Sona's next attack deals bonus magic damage in addition to a bonus effect depending on what song Sona last activated.

wikia_skill_i1.name: Power Chord
wikia_skill_i1.blurb: After casting 3 spells, Sona's next attack deals bonus magic damage in addition to a bonus effect depending on what song Sona last activated.
wikia_skill_i1.description: {{sbc|Aura:}} '''Sona's''' basic [[Champion ability|abilities]] each generate a unique [[aura]] for 3 seconds that empowers her and all allied [[champion]]s who enter its radius, also incurring a {{fd|0.5}} seconds period during which she cannot cast her other basic abilities.
wikia_skill_i1.description2: {{sbc|Power Chord:}} After casting 3 basic abilities, '''Sona's''' next [[basic attack]] deals {{pp|20;30;40;50;60;70;80;90;105 to 240|formula=10+10 at each level up to 8 and+15 up to 18}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}} {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}}, with an additional effect depending on the last basic ability cast.
wikia_skill_i1.notes:
* When ''Power Chord'' is ready, Sona gains a ring around her.
** This ring will have a different color depending on the last ability used (''{{ai|Hymn of Valor|Sona|blue}}, {{ai|Aria of Perseverance|Sona|green}} or {{ai|Song of Celerity|Sona|purple}}'').
*** The effect does not change if abilities are used while the projectile is in motion.
* Sona's auras will only affect allied champions, not [[minion]]s or [[Champion summoned units|pets]].
* ''Power Chord'' affects [[turret]]s, [[inhibitor]]s, and the [[nexus]], but {{ai|Aria of Perseverance|Sona|Diminuendo's}} damage debuff does not.
* The triggering attack will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal.
** ''Power Chord's'' bonus damage will go through {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodge}} while the triggering attack will be mitigated.
** ''Power Chord's'' damage can {{tip|blind|miss}} or be {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|blocked}}.

wikia_skill_q1.name: Hymn of Valor
wikia_skill_q1.blurb: Sona plays the Hymn of Valor, sends out bolts of sound, dealing magic damage to two nearby enemies, prioritizing champions and monsters. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone bonus damage on their next attack against enemies.
wikia_skill_q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sona''' sends out two bolts of sound that deal {{as|magic damage}} to the nearest enemies, prioritizing champions.
wikia_skill_q1.description2: {{sbc|Aura:}} '''Sona''' and tagged allied champions deal {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} on their next basic attack within 3 seconds.
wikia_skill_q1.description3: {{sbc|{{ai|Power Chord|Sona}} – Staccato:}} ''Power Chord'' deals{{ft|{{pp|20*1.4;30*1.4;40*1.4;50*1.4;60*1.4;70*1.4;80*1.4;90*1.4;105*1.4 to 240*1.4|formula=14+14 at each level up to 8 and+21 up to 18}} {{as|(+ 28% AP)}} '''total''' magic damage.|40% '''bonus''' magic damage.}}
wikia_skill_q1.notes:
* ''Hymn of Valor's'' aura doesn't trigger [[spell effects]].
* Even if both bolts hit the same enemy they can only be damaged by one.
* ''Hymn of Valor'' will only target enemy units if Sona has sight of them.
** If the target gets out of sight before the projectile hits them they will still be damaged.

wikia_skill_w1.name: Aria of Perseverance
wikia_skill_w1.blurb: Sona plays the Aria of Perseverance, sending out protective melodies, healing Sona and a nearby wounded ally. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone a temporary shield.
wikia_skill_w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sona''' {{tip|heals}} herself and the most wounded nearby allied champion.
wikia_skill_w1.description2: {{sbc|Aura:}} '''Sona''' and tagged allied champions receive a {{tip|shield}} lasting up to {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
wikia_skill_w1.description3: {{sbc|{{ai|Power Chord|Sona}} – Diminuendo:}} ''Power Chord'' reduces its target's damage output by 25% {{as|(+ 4% per 100 AP)}} for 3 seconds.
wikia_skill_w1.notes:
* ''Aria of Perseverance'' can heal [[stealth]]ed ally champions without revealing them but the projectile will reveal their position on cast.
* If no one is injured ''Aria of Perseverance'' will target the closest allied champion.
* While ''Aria of Perseverance'' will not heal [[minion]]s or [[Champion summoned units|pets]] it will heal {{ai|Mirror Image|LeBlanc}}, {{ai|Hallucinate|Shaco}}, and {{ai|Decoy|Wukong}}.
*Diminuendo will also reduce the target's size slightly as well.

wikia_skill_e1.name: Song of Celerity
wikia_skill_e1.blurb: Sona plays the Song of Celerity, granting nearby allies bonus Movement Speed. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allied champions tagged by the zone bonus Movement Speed on their next attack.
wikia_skill_e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Sona''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 3 seconds, extended to up to 7 seconds if she doesn't take damage.
wikia_skill_e1.leveling: {{st|Self and Aura Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|10|11|12|13|14}}% {{as|(+ 6% per 100 AP)}}}}
wikia_skill_e1.description2: {{sbc|Aura:}} Tagged allied champions gain {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 3 seconds.
wikia_skill_e1.description3: {{sbc|{{ai|Power Chord|Sona}} – Tempo:}} ''Power Chord'' {{tip|slow|slows}} its target by 40% {{as|(+ 4% per 100 AP)}} for 2 seconds.

wikia_skill_r1.name: Crescendo
wikia_skill_r1.blurb: Sona plays her ultimate chord, stunning enemy champions and forcing them to dance and dealing magic damage to them. Each rank reduces the base cooldown of Sona's basic abilities.
wikia_skill_r1.description2: {{sbc|Active:}} After a {{fd|0.2}}-second delay, '''Sona''' plays an irresistible chord in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemy champions struck and {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for {{fd|1.5}} seconds.
wikia_skill_r1.notes:
* Enemies {{tip|stun|stunned}} by ''Crescendo'' are made to dance 50% faster for its duration.
* ''Crescendo'' has a short travel time, and enemies will be stunned and take damage as soon as it reaches them, but if a target moves out of range as it is cast, the target will be unaffected.
